metaWarningMessage1: To use this application, you need the MetaMask browser extension. Please
walletConnectMessage1: Please connect your MetaMask wallet to interact with the application.
accountRegistrationMessage2: To continue, please fund your account using the
accountRegistrationMessage3: and link your email address to your wallet address.
accountRegistrationMessage4: This is required for further access to the platform's functionality.
submitVoteMessage: Please consider your choice carefully. Be advised that once confirmed, it cannot be changed.
reqSendSuccess: Your request has been successfully sent! Please wait for the organization administrator to process it.
emptyKey: Joining the organization requires an access key. Please enter it to continue.
voteSuccess: Your vote has been successfully recorded. Thank you for voting! The results will be available after the voting closes.
voteFail: Something went wrong. Your vote has not been recorded.
closePollMessage: Are you sure you want to close the voting? This action cannot be undone, and no new votes will be accepted.
metamask-error: This email or address is already registered.
metamask-registration-success: Your email successfully connected to your address!
